publ: by Brandi Music For Business and Easy On Hold
name: MyBrandiMusic
0:
”Alexa open business music stream”
”Alexa finish the stream”
”Alexa stop the stream”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: business music stream
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Everyone likes to hear music while working, shopping, dining... anytime. It's a great idea to play music in your business, but you'll need to be licensed. Brandi Music is a streaming business music service with more than 70 channels of popular music you can control online. You can mix up to four channels for a custom blend, set up schedules with start and stop dates and times, and even block individual songs. Profanity-free, family-friendly music that's right for your business. All without the hassle of building playlists. Also, you can now add this skill as a Routine in the Alexa App by following the steps: 
1. Open your Alexa App.
2. Select Routines.
3. Select Schedule, add a time (say 7 AM).
4. Choose Skills / Your Skills.
5. Choose 'My Brandi Music'. Done.
